description: Elasticity of commuting cost w.r.t. distance
source: UK adaptation of DP (2023) Table I p.2238; lower UK values reflect shorter commuting distances (DfT NTS)
UK adapted from DP (2023) Table I p.2238 cols 4-5; higher UK values reflect denser road networks
Graham & Melo (2011); Bosquet & Overman (2019); Rice et al. (2006); UK estimates ~63% of US
D'Costa & Overman (2014); De la Roca & Puga (2017) UK adaptation
Valentinyi & Herrendorf (2008) p.1977; adapted for UK land share
